abstract.t: The IPv4/IPv6 transisation period will last for a long time. Different phases of IPv4/IPv6 transisation have different scenarioes and requirements and need different solutions. In the early stage of IPv4/IPv6 transisation, sicne the majority of Internet resoure locates in the IPv4 Internet, the main communication will be IPv6 clients iniate communication to IPv4 servers. But during the later stage of the transisation, the servers may locate in the IPv6 network/Internet, in this scenario, there is a need for IPv4 client to iniate communication to IPv6 servers. These document proposal solution to address this scenario.
